title: Design Systems
description: Building design ecosystems, based on a scalable and maintainable component libraries with clear documentation

principles.title: Single Source of Truth
principles.description: A centralized repository where all design decisions live, ensuring consistency across all platforms, tools and teams.

principles.title: Consistency Over Uniformity
principles.description: Maintain predictable behavior and shared rules without forcing every interface to look identical.

principles.title: Adoption Over Perfection
principles.description: Prioritize usable, evolving systems that teams actually adopt over perfect-but-ignored ideal solutions.

principles.title: Constraints-Driven Design
principles.description: Define clear constraints so teams build consistent solutions without stifling flexibility.

principles.title: Documentation as a Product
principles.description: Treat documentation as a first-class product with ownership, roadmap, and quality standards.

principles.title: Modularity and Composability
principles.description: Build complex interfaces by composing smaller, focused components that work together predictably.

principles.title: Scalability by Design
principles.description: Design systems must grow with the organization, supporting new teams, products, and use cases without breaking existing implementations.

principles.title: Design–Development Parity
principles.description: Keep design and development artifacts in sync, ensuring what is designed matches what is built and maintained.

principles.title: Clear Ownership and Governance
principles.description: Establish clear processes for contributions, reviews, and decision-making to ensure quality and consistency.

principles.title: Accessibility as a Baseline
principles.description: Accessibility built into the foundation of every component, not added as an afterthought.

principles.title: Explicit Constraints
principles.description: Make constraints visible and documented so teams understand boundaries and can work within them effectively.

principles.title: Evolvability and Versioning
principles.description: Maintain stable APIs while evolving the system, with clear versioning strategies and migration paths.

principles.title: Feedback-Driven Improvement
principles.description: Continuously improve the system based on real usage data, user feedback, and team needs.
